TitlePage.Title: &SimplicialObjects;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Topology via Simplicial Sets
TitlePage.TitleComment:
(this manual is still under construction)
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document. The latest version is available online at:
http://homalg.math.rwth-aachen.de/~barakat/homalg-project/SimplicialObjects/chap0.html
An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
This package is part of the &homalg;-project:
http://homalg.math.rwth-aachen.de/index.php/unreleased/simplicialobjects
